Text: I became so fascinated by the ZX81, a truly scientific small computer, that I continued using it until 1998, plugged to a 14 inch B/W TV set, only when I had to connect to internet I had to drop it from everyday use. I wrote lots of programs for it, I could write capitals and small type, characters for many languages, I had fabulous astronomy programs, about 600 programs of all kinds, I had it plugged to a Canon BJ200 printer, I had a modem to connect to the primitive networks, I didnt need anything else, but the internet changed that....

User Type: n I got that Casio thing - I never used it much."
